name: CXProviderConfiguration
desc: An encapsulation of the configuration of a provider object.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates the configuration of a provider object.

items.name: var ringtoneSound: String?
items.desc: The name of the sound resource in the app bundle to be used for the provider ringtone.

items.name: var iconTemplateImageData: Data?
items.desc: The PNG data for the icon image to be displayed for the provider.

items.name: var maximumCallGroups: Int
items.desc: The maximum number of call groups.

items.name: var maximumCallsPerCallGroup: Int
items.desc: The maximum number of calls per call group.

items.name: var supportsVideo: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the provider supports video in addition to audio.

items.name: var includesCallsInRecents: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the provider includes a call in the systemâ€™s Recents list after the call ends.
